question_answer.question: What was the primary focus of the geological engineering reconnaissance conducted after the 2006 Hawaii earthquakes?

B. To assess the effectiveness of emergency response teams
C. To evaluate the economic impact of the earthquakes
D. To study the historical seismic activity in Hawaii
